about:
╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                      ABOUT ME                              ║
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

Hi! I'm Na Le 👋

Solving puzzles has been my passion since childhood. I could spend 
the whole day classifying pieces into different groups and then 
connecting them to make a cohesive whole. Coding gives me that 
same rush of putting the final piece into place.

I'm an accomplished Software Engineer and Data Analyst with a 
Master's in Computer Science from Virginia Tech and 4 years of 
academic project experience across 7 data management and 17 
software development projects.

🎓 Education:
   • MEng in Computer Science - Virginia Tech (GPA: 3.6)
   • BS in Computational Modeling & Data Analytics - VT (GPA: 3.5)
   • AS in Computer Science - J Sargeant Reynolds CC

🔍 What I Do:
   • Design and optimize robust data pipelines
   • Build machine learning models for predictive analytics
   • Develop full-stack web applications with Python/Django
   • Apply NLP techniques to solve real-world problems
   • Perform software quality assurance and testing

💡 Key Achievements:
   • Improved data accessibility by 19% and reduced access time by 30%
   • Achieved 83% accuracy in ML models for predictive analysis
   • Reduced evaluation bias by 19% using advanced NLP
   • Delivered insights that drove 10% revenue increase

🌱 Currently:
   Software QA Analyst at PNK Connections (June 2025 - Present)
   Building "Math with Le" - an AI-powered tutoring platform

🌍 Languages: English & Vietnamese (Bilingual), Japanese (Elementary)

📍 Location: Glen Allen, VA (Open to relocation)
